## Overview

Assistive technologies can use this property to improve navigation and describe the level number of levels [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes/HeadingLevelAttribute/HeadingLevel/h1] through [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes/HeadingLevelAttribute/HeadingLevel/h6] alongside the text.

For example, you can rank sections within UI using a heading level. The most important section is marked with[doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes/HeadingLevelAttribute/HeadingLevel/h1]. Nested sections can use subsequent heading levels. For unranked headings, use [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes/HeadingLevelAttribute/HeadingLevel/unspecified].

# AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.HeadingLevelAttribute

**Enumeration**

An attribute for the level of this heading.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen enum HeadingLevelAttribute
```

## Overview

Assistive technologies can use this property to improve navigation and describe the level number of levels [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes/HeadingLevelAttribute/HeadingLevel/h1] through [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes/HeadingLevelAttribute/HeadingLevel/h6] alongside the text.

For example, you can rank sections within UI using a heading level. The most important section is marked with[doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes/HeadingLevelAttribute/HeadingLevel/h1]. Nested sections can use subsequent heading levels. For unranked headings, use [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes/HeadingLevelAttribute/HeadingLevel/unspecified].

## Enumerations

- **AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.HeadingLevelAttribute.HeadingLevel**: The hierarchy of a heading in relation other headings.

## Conforms To

- AttributedStringKey
- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- DecodableAttributedStringKey
- EncodableAttributedStringKey
- MarkdownDecodableAttributedStringKey
- ObjectiveCConvertibleAttributedStringKey
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
